intro.p: Use the information given and your knowledge of trig ratios to answer the question.

content.p: You are practicing drone flight maneuvers for a certification test. Your spotter is standing {{H_dist}} meters away from the vertical line directly below your drone. They tell you they have to look up at a {{angle}}^{\circ} angle to see it. How high is the drone flying? Explain how you figured it out. Show all work and give your answer rounded to two decimal places.

outtro.p: Use tan( {{angle}} ) to find the height of the drone. The drone is flying at a height of {{high}} meters.
